Metadata.Title: CVE-2025-2312 affecting package cifs-utils for versions less than 7.3-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2025-2312 affecting package cifs-utils for versions less than 7.3-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package cifs-utils is earlier than 7.3-1, affected by CVE-2025-2312
